availability_constraints: Key resource for all UI/UX and accessibility standards.
risk_mitigation: Create a reusable accessibility checklist and component library to standardize implementation.
alternative_allocation: Can assist mobile.dev with complex Flutter UI if needed.

availability_constraints: Over-allocated in early sprints. Critical resource for security and architecture.
skill_development_goals: Advanced Firestore scaling patterns, multi-region architecture.
risk_mitigation: Offload some Firebase Functions work (e.g., non-security critical) to fullstack.dev. Prioritize security rule implementation.
alternative_allocation: High risk of burnout; consider augmenting with a contractor for Sprint 1-2.

availability_constraints: Dedicated to mobile-specific features starting Sprint 3. Over-allocated in Sprint 3.
risk_mitigation: Pair program with frontend.dev on complex UI. Defer non-critical mobile features if offline sync proves more complex than estimated.
alternative_allocation: Re-estimate offline stories after a technical spike.

availability_constraints: High context switching between frontend and backend.
skill_development_goals: Advanced server-side data aggregation for reporting.
risk_mitigation: Dedicate focus to either backend or frontend per sprint to reduce context switching penalty. Pair with backend.dev on aggregation functions.
alternative_allocation: Can assist backend.dev with non-security critical Cloud Functions.
